title: WTB: George Stone Sweet Cap. 350 Fac 25
author: ILTBOC2

posts.post_title: WTB: George Stone Sweet Cap. 350 Fac 25
posts.post_content:
If anyone has a George Stone Sweet Caporal 350 Fac 25 in any condition from raw to psa 4/SGC 50 condition, I would be interested in purchasing it.  If you have one available, please send me a PM.  

Thanks,
Andy

Darn!  Thought I had a beauty for you, but it's Fact 30 instead of 25! If at all interested just LMK.

Fred

Friendly bump for those that may be at National.  Still looking for T206 George Stone Sweet Caporal 150 Fac 25 and Sweet Caporal 350 Fac 25.  Also would be interested in any T206 George Stone with name at top and bottom cards if found.

If you find anything, please let me know the price to see if we can work out a deal.

The easiest way to get in touch is through PM.

Thanks!
Andy

Hello.  I'm still looking for a George Stone Sweet Caporal 350 Fac 25.  If you have one your are willing to part with, please let me know.  It's the last card I need for my Stone back run.

Thanks!
Andy

Bump.

The hunt is still on for this card.  It's the last one needed to complete my Stone back run.  Any help would be appreciated!  Thanks!
Ever optimistic I am. Bumping in the hopes someone who has grown increasingly tired of this card is looking to move it on to my collection. :). Thanks for looking!
